Site.Description: City of Langley Internal Web Mapping Application

FeatureHyperlink.ToolTip: View drawing for {PIPE DIAMETER} {MATERIAL} sanitary main
View drawing for fibre optic line

DataLink.Command: SELECT CONVERT(INTEGER,HOUSE) AS HOUSE_NUM, STREET, UNIT, CITY, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE, PLAN_NUMBER, LOT, PID, FOLIO, LEGAL_TYPE, PROPERTY_NUMBER, GISLINK, LEGAL_ID, 'http://col-gis.col.local/LegalPlans/' + PLAN_NUMBER + '.tif' AS LEGAL_PLAN FROM TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL, TempestLive.dbo.IHL_PARCEL_TEMPEST_JOIN WHERE TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL.GISLINK = TempestLive.dbo.IHL_PARCEL_TEMPEST_JOIN.TEMPEST_ID and TempestLive.dbo.IHL_PARCEL_TEMPEST_JOIN.PARCEL_ID = @PIDfromLayer ORDER BY (CASE WHEN LEGAL_TYPE = 'LAND' THEN 0 WHEN LEGAL_TYPE = 'STRATA' THEN 1 WHEN LEGAL_TYPE = 'ALIAS' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END), UNIT

SearchTable.Command: SELECT LEGAL_ID, PROPERTY_NUMBER, FOLIO, PID, PLAN_NUMBER, LOT, GISLINK, STREET, HOUSE, UNIT, CITY, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE FROM TempestLive.dbo.LAND_LEGAL
